name: @appnest/readme
description: Generate pretty best-practice and easy-to-maintain README files
author: Appnest

scripts.git:add:commit:push: git add . && git commit --no-edit --amend --no-verify && git push
scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch && npm run git:add:commit:push
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor && npm run git:add:commit:push
scripts.bump:major: npm version major && npm run git:add:commit:push
scripts.publish:patch: npm run bump:patch && npm run b:lib && npm run publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run bump:minor && npm run b:lib && npm run publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run bump:major && npm run b:lib && npm run publish

readme.text: Use this readme generator to easily generate pretty readme's like this one! Simply extend your package.json and create a readme blueprint.
bullets: **Simple:** Extremely simple to use - so simple that it almost feels like magic!
**Powerful:** Customize almost everything - add your own templates and variables if you like
**Awesome:** The tool you don't know you need before you have many different repositories that all need maintenance

templates.name: install
templates.template: Run `npm install [[ readme.ids.npm ]]' to install this library!
